post:
[PremiumVM](www.premiumvm.com) is back! As you will see by my other LET thread, we're relaunching and we're kicking off with 2 deals you just can't miss. We can guarantee you will get to use **all** your resources. Yes, that's right - there is **no overselling**. Some providers call their services "unmanaged" and then don't give you any support at all. We advertise "basic" management - this means that your services aren't fully managed, however we won't leave you in the dark. We will help you. We have more great deals to come, but this one won't last long so grab one before stock runs out.

Location: Columbus, OH (XLHost)
Test IP: On request (ticket/PM)
Test File: On request (ticket/PM)
TOS: http://premiumvm.com/terms.html
**IPv6 is available upon request (via ticket)**

<pre><strong>1GB @ $4</strong>

30GB Disk Space
350GB Bandwidth
1GB RAM
1.5GB Burstable RAM (or vSwap)
4 CPU Cores
OpenVZ Virtualization
Choice of Linux OS's
1 IP Address (more available upon request)

$4.00/month - <a href="https://premiumvm.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=1">Order Now</a></pre>

<pre><strong>2GB @ $6</strong>

30GB Disk Space
350GB Bandwidth
2GB RAM
2.5GB Burstable RAM (or vSwap)
4 CPU Cores
OpenVZ Virtualization
Choice of Linux OS's
1 IP Address (more available upon request)

$6.00/month - <a href="https://premiumvm.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=2">Order Now</a></pre>

**Other useful information:**

All packages are upgradable, submit a ticket for pricing. We also offer custom packages, contact us for details.
Submit a ticket: https://www.premiumvm.com/clients/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1
Live Chat: in the bottom right corner of the website

All orders are subject to multiple fraud checks. If you pass the fraud checks, your order will be activated within 24 business hours (although usually much sooner).

Let me know if you have any questions. I'm here to help!

Thanks for looking.
